posts.post_content:
Looking for N43s - all sports, raw or graded. Please PM with available cards. Thank you!

John Wondowski

[quote name="wondo" post=2479944]Looking for N43s - all sports, raw or graded. Please PM with available cards. Thank you!

John Wondowski[/QUOTE]

John.  Was wondering if you can help me out.  I bought an N43 and it is shiny on the front.  Was hoping you could tell me what to look for for authenticity. 

Thanks

Geoff
N43s are not glossy. Post a couple of pics of front and reverse here.

Here are the photos

It is not "glossy" but does have a bit of a shine in some areas.

Thank you!

I was figuring that you were thrown off by the shine from the inking process. Card is 100% real.

I have at least 5/6 N43's with back damage but decent fronts. I will be listing them on eBay in the near future if I can get off the couch.

I have a very nice set missing one card (much nicer than the one currently listed on the bay and all graded - with 24 cards that range from 60 to 80). I'll suppose I would sell for a silly strong offer.
Thanks so much for the reply.  Just sent to SGC for a nice Tux.  Appreciate the info and will look out for your listings.
